Package com.example.goldencarrot.data.model.user

Interface User

All Known Implementing Classes:
FacilityUserImpl, UserImpl
public interface User
Interface representing a User in the system. This interface defines the basic attributes and behaviors of a user, including their contact details, user type, and notification preferences. The implementing class must provide methods for getting and setting these properties. Todo : User controller class that validates user creation and deletion

  • Method Details

    • getEmail

      String getEmail()
      Returns the email address of the user.
      Returns:
      the user's email address as a String.

    • getUserType

      String getUserType()
      Returns the type of user (e.g., Organizer, Admin, etc.).
      Returns:
      the type of the user as a String.

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns the name of the user.
      Returns:
      the user's name as a String.

    • getPhoneNumber

      Optional<String> getPhoneNumber()
      Returns the phone number of the user, if available.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user's phone number, or an empty Optional if no phone number is set.

    • getUserId

      String getUserId()
      Returns the unique user ID.
      Returns:
      the user's ID as a String.

    • getAdminNotification

      Boolean getAdminNotification()
      Returns whether the user has opted to receive admin notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the user has enabled admin notifications, false otherwise.

    • getOrganizerNotifications

      Boolean getOrganizerNotifications()
      Returns whether the user has opted to receive organizer notifications.
      Returns:
      true if the user has enabled organizer notifications, false otherwise.

    • getProfileImage

      String getProfileImage()
      Returns the profile image of the user.
      Returns:
      the user's profile image as a String.

    • setUserId

      void setUserId(String uId)
      Sets the unique user ID. Should be the Android Id
      Parameters:
      uId - the user ID to set.

    • setProfileImage

      void setProfileImage(String pId)
      Sets the unique profile ID.
      Parameters:
      pId - the profile ID to set.

    • setPhoneNumber

      void setPhoneNumber(Optional<String> phoneNumber)
      Sets the phone number of the user.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - an Optional containing the user's phone number, or an empty Optional if no phone number is provided
